job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: pstronguResponsibilitiesustrongpulliWork on a crossfunctional team including Data Scientists Product Managers Engineers and marketing leads across the organizationliliBuild scalable tools to measure transactional data trends and risk measurements Develop algorithms and experiments to minimize merchant default risk and to forecast cash flow demandliliCreate and maintain data pipelines dashboards and data models around our communications ecosystem Identify and own data latency and data quality issuesliliPull data and conduct product analysis to discover and suggest new product functionality and optimize existing services and systemsliliPrototyping new features and building new ideas by writing code in PythonliliImplement new approaches in collaboration with software engineers in production Python Ruby on Rails Golang and othersliulpbrppstronguRequirementsustrongppstrongRequired Skillsememstrong Python Jupyter PandasppstrongNice to have Skillsem emstrongSQLppstrongAdditional RequirementsstrongppThis job requires the candidate to be onsite in Chicago for 13 months with the option to work fully remotely afterwardppbrp
